### Alliaria petiolata

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    1 - G_{2} & 0 & F * V * (1 - G_{1}) \\
    G_{2} & 0 & F * v * G_{1} \\
    0 & S & 0
    \end{bmatrix}$$
    
    
### Carduus nutans

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    S_{b} & 0 & F * e \\
    g_{b} & 0 & F * g_{i} \\
    0 & s_{j} & 0
    \end{bmatrix}$$ 
    
    
### Draba verna

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    0 & v_{3} * (1 - G) & 0 & 0 & 0 \\
    0 & 0 & v_{2} * (1-G) & 0 & 0 \\
    0 & 0 & 0 & v_{1} * (1- G) & 0 \\
    0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & s * f * v_{0} * (1-G) \\ 
    v_{4} * G & v_{3} * G & v_{2} * G &
    v_{1} * G &  s * f * v_{0} * G
  \end{bmatrix}$$

### Kummerowia striata

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    0 & 0 & f * v * G_{2} \\
    1 & 0 & f * v * G_{1} \\
    0 & 1 & s * f * v * G_{0}
\end{bmatrix}$$


### Lepidium campestre

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    s * f * g 
\end{bmatrix}$$

### Lespedeza cuneata

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    0 & 0 & 0 & F_{S} * (1-g) * v & F_{M} * (1-g) * v & F_{L} * (1-g) * v \\
    g * v & 0 & 0 & F_{S} * g * v & F_{M} * g * v & F_{L} * g * v \\
    0 & P_{Sdl1} * S_{Sdl} & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 \\
    0 & P2_{Sdl1} * S_{Sdl} & P_{Sdl2} * S_{Sdl2} & S_{S} * C_{SS} & S_{M} * R_{SM} & 0 \\
    0 & 0 & 0 & S_{S} * P_{MS} & S_{M} * C_{MM} & S_{L} * R_{ML} \\
    0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & S_{M} * P_{LM} & S_{L} * C_{LL}
\end{bmatrix}$$

### Perilla frutescens

$$\begin{bmatrix} s * f * g  \end{bmatrix}$$

### Potentilla recta

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    s_{b} & 0 & 0 & f * v * (1-g_{i}) \\
    g_{b} & 0 & 0 & f * v * g_{i} \\
    0 & s_{1a} * s_{1b} * (1-p_{1}) & s_{2} * (1-p_{2}) & s_{3} * (1-p_{3}) \\
    0 & s_{1a} * s_{1b} * p_{1} & s_{2} * p_{2} & s_{3} * p_{3}
\end{bmatrix}$$

### Thlaspi perfoliatum

$$\begin{bmatrix} 
    a_{1} & s * f * v * (1-g)\\
    a_{2} & s * f * v * g
\end{bmatrix}$$


### Verbascum thapsus

$$\begin{bmatrix}
    s_{b} * (1-g_{b}) & 0 & f * v * (1-g_{i}) \\
    s_{b} * g_{b} & 0 & f * v * g_{i} \\
    0 & s_{j} & 0
\end{bmatrix}$$
